pages.title: First, tell us a little about yourself
pages.header: This survey takes approximately 5 minutes to complete.

fields.label: How long have you worked at this organization? (in years)
fields.name: org_years

fields.label: How many layers of management are you below your CEO?
fields.help: If you're not sure, take your best guess.
fields.name: management_layers

fields.label: How would you describe your organization's position in the market?
fields.name: org_position

fields.label: How would you describe your organization’s traction in the market?
fields.name: org_traction

fields.label: What team and/or department do you work in?
fields.name: team

pages.title: Purpose
pages.header: Help us understand your organization's reason for being.

fields.label: Rate your level of agreement with the following statements.

options.PuN: Our purpose helps us measure our progress in an uncertain world.
options.PuA: Our purpose gives us a long-term vision that moderates short-term expectations.
options.PuS: Our purpose and culture influence our decisions more than management.
options.PuI: Our purpose serves and mobilizes a community of users and partners.
options.PuD: Our purpose aligns our goals at all levels.
options.PuR: Our purpose inspires us to discover new data and insights.
options.PuT: Our purpose gives teams the freedom to attempt unconventional projects.

fields.label: For the statements you disagreed with (either somewhat or strongly), what can the organization do to improve?
fields.name: purpose_verbatims

pages.title: People
pages.header: Help us understand the people and teams who do the work.

fields.label: Rate your level of agreement with the following statements.

options.PeN: Our teams are empowered to pursue their work without management interference.
options.PeA: Our teams embrace uncertainty and complexity.
options.PeS: Our teams are tightly knit and technologically connected.
options.PeI: Our teams have high performers in every position.
options.PeD: Our teams only include the people necessary to do the work.
options.PeR: Our teams are diverse and multidisciplinary.
options.PeT: Our teams are enhanced by crowds and communities outside our walls.

fields.label: For the statements you disagreed with (either somewhat or strongly), what can the organization do to improve?
fields.name: people_verbatims

pages.title: Process
pages.header: Help us understand how the work gets done.

fields.label: Rate your level of agreement with the following statements.

options.PrN: Our process involves customers and users in the creation of our products and services.
options.PrA: Our process enables what is working to spread.
options.PrS: Our processes and rules are simple, intuitive, and easy to remember.
options.PrI: Our process requires teams to share information so that everyone can benefit.
options.PrD: Our process helps us prepare for a variety of possible outcomes.
options.PrR: Our process dedicates a set amount of time and resources to personal projects.
options.PrT: Our process enables teams to form, evolve, and disband themselves.

fields.label: For the statements you disagreed with (either somewhat or strongly), what can the organization do to improve?
fields.name: process_verbatims

pages.title: Product
pages.header: Help us understand what you offer to your users or customers.

fields.label: Rate your level of agreement with the following statements.

options.PdN: Our products and services get more valuable as more people use them.
options.PdA: Our products and services learn from being used.
options.PdS: Our products and services are improved gradually and frequently.
options.PdI: Our products and services resist becoming unwieldy or unfocused.
options.PdD: Our products and services are designed to work together and share information.
options.PdR: Our product and service decisions are made by teams who are closest to our users/customers.
options.PdT: Our product and service innovations and improvements are tested with real users daily.

fields.label: For the statements you disagreed with (either somewhat or strongly), what can the organization do to improve?
fields.name: product_verbatims

pages.title: Platform
pages.header: Help us understand if and how any of your products allow a community to improve or build upon them.

fields.label: Rate your level of agreement with the following statements.

options.PlN: Our platform remains focused and simple in order to support a dynamic community.
options.PlA: Our platform allows our community to build businesses on top of our business.
options.PlS: Our platform empowers our community with an open and clear interface.
options.PlI: Our platform helps us find successful partners that we can incorporate into our ecosystem.
options.PlD: Our platform learns from customers who use it and our products in unexpected ways.
options.PlR: Our platform produces data that is available to our community.
options.PlT: Our platform allows us to pursue new relationships even before we know what value they’ll offer.

fields.label: For the statements you disagreed with (either somewhat or strongly), what can the organization do to improve?
fields.name: platform_verbatims

People.description: The teams that do the work

Platform.description: What the community creates on our behalf

Serve Networks.description: Resilient lines of connection outward even over robust internal hierarchies

Distribute Authority.description: Empowered local agents even over centralized command and control

Seek Simplicity.description: Resisting and reducing complicatedness even over rigorous process

Process Information.description: Acting on and sharing information even over amassing and protecting it

Encourage Divergence.description: Allowing for a variety of ideas and practices even over standardization

Enable Crossover.description: Replication of successes at the edge even over repeating historical practices

Embrace Uncertainty.description: Short-term hypothesis testing even over long-term planning
